channel.title: üè¢ ShanghaiTech University on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ ShanghaiTech University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: CryoGEM: Physics-Informed Generative Cryo-Electron Microscopy
item.description: CryoGEM: Physics-informed generative model creates realistic synthetic cryo-EM datasets, boosting particle picking and pose estimation accuracy for higher-resolution protein structure determination.

item.title: Diffusion-based Reinforcement Learning via Q-weighted Variational Policy Optimization
item.description: QVPO, a novel online RL algorithm, leverages diffusion models’ multimodality to boost performance in continuous control tasks, overcoming limitations of unimodal policies.

item.title: Federated Learning from Vision-Language Foundation Models: Theoretical Analysis and Method
item.description: PromptFolio optimizes federated learning of vision-language models by combining global and local prompts, improving generalization and personalization, as proven theoretically and empirically.

item.title: Generalize or Detect? Towards Robust Semantic Segmentation Under Multiple Distribution Shifts
item.description: This research presents a novel method for robust semantic segmentation, achieving state-of-the-art results by generating coherent images with both semantic and covariate shifts and recalibrating uncer…

item.title: OctreeOcc: Efficient and Multi-Granularity Occupancy Prediction Using Octree Queries
item.description: OctreeOcc uses octree queries for efficient and multi-granularity 3D occupancy prediction, surpassing state-of-the-art methods with reduced computational costs.

item.title: Safe and Efficient: A Primal-Dual Method for Offline Convex CMDPs under Partial Data Coverage
item.description: A novel primal-dual method boosts offline safe reinforcement learning efficiency for convex CMDPs by using uncertainty parameters and achieving a sample complexity of O(1/(1-Œ≥)‚àön).

item.title: Understanding Representation of Deep Equilibrium Models from Neural Collapse Perspective
item.description: Deep Equilibrium Models excel on imbalanced data due to feature convergence and self-duality properties, unlike explicit models, as shown through Neural Collapse analysis.
